name: Backrooms2000
description:
Backrooms2000, is an RPG Maker 2000 game. the game is all about the backrooms, it's treasures and it's monsters. The game is inspired by OFF and other games similar.

The game follows Nick, a teenage boy who somehow found his way into the backrooms. he has heard of the backrooms, but he never knew what it would look like.

This is Ash, a soul who entered the backrooms after his body in the overworld rotted. he is also the tour guide of the backrooms. he doesn't really tour guide, but he helps the newcomers learn how to fight the monsters of the place.

This is Bernie, no one knows who he is, but sometimes he might just appear right in-front of you.

This is Mike, an artist in the Backrooms. He isn't the best artist, but tries with all his might (even if that fighting someone).
